directions: Combine aioli ingredients (mayonnaise, basil, garlic, salt and pepper) in a mixing bowl. Spread on toasted bread slices.
Layer chicken breast, tomato, lettuce, avocado, and bacon on a slice of bread. Top with another bread slice and enjoy!
ingredients: 3 slices thinly sliced grilled chicken breast
title: Chicken BLT by Avocados From Mexico
